sourcesContent: {/* Gradient Header */} Current Value ₹ {data.currentValue} Total Returns{' '} ↑ ₹ {data.totalReturns} ({data.returnsPercent}) {/* Card with negative margin to overlap header */} Invested ₹ {data.invested} XIRR {data.xirr} 1 Day Return ₹ {data.dayReturn} ({data.dayReturnPercent}) {/* Action Buttons */} {/* Bottom Buttons */}
